website_summaries.verdict: Best value on a pack of emergency ponchos that come in sizes for adults and children.
pros: Large 50-inch by 40-inch size for adults and 30-inch x 30-inch size for kids
Half adult and half kid sized
Easy to pack for vacation or day use at a theme park, festival, or camping
Colors make people easy to spot in crowds
cons: These ponchos are very thin and will not last longer than one use

customer_reviews.title: Good disposable ponchos for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the $. We purchased this pack for a Disneyland / California Adventures trip for the family. Ponchos worked well for the water rides and since they came individually packed, they were easy to throw in the backpack. They are definitely 1-time-use ponchos. They are a little thin, so a few times they would rip/tear on the ride, but nothing too bad. We have a few left over and I will throw them in the car for emergencies. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Q

customer_reviews.title: They were great quality. We wore them an entire day at ...
customer_reviews.text: THese ponchos were delivered in exactly the right time with Prime. They were great quality. We wore them an entire day at Animal Kingdom. Rode rides, walked, sat in an 3 hour downpour waiting for the River of Light show. They were PERFECT! Sizing was great also; my husband is 6'5 and my son is about 46 inches. We were all well covered and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well! Came individually wrapped and labeled. Convenient ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well! Came individually wrapped and labeled. Convenient for my family of 5 for a trip to Disneyland. It rained a day we went to the park, so these came in handy. We also used one of the clear ones as a cover for our stroller!
customer_reviews.author: 3🌞🌞🌞

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an Orlando trip!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the ponchos to take on our Orlando vacation. It rained (down poured) every single day so I’m very happy that we had them. They’re individually packaged small enough to fit in a pocket. We didn’t need the kids size ponchos but there wasn’t a way to buy a package of just adult ponchos. They do tear fairly easy so, you need to be careful. My niece ripped hers and had to use the child’s size. It was a bit small but did the job. She’s 12 and it came to her lower waist area. A child’s size is for kids 10 and under I’d say. I would buy again. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Btrflygrl

customer_reviews.title: Great value instead of buying individual ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money! Received 10 kid and 10 adult ponchos of various colors. My family of four spent a rainy week at Disney and these ponchos came in very handy to keep us all dry. I even used one as a stroller cover during thunderstorms. They did the job, can’t go wrong for the money. The kids size is rather small. Fit my 3 year old but would be too small for my 9 year old. Kept my little one dry and he actually enjoyed wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: P.david

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for any rainy day!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product ! These are really great. Child ponchos Fits great on my 5 and 9 year olds and fits me and my wife well. I'm 6' and my wife is 5'7" They are made for one time use. But with 20 at a great price they are perfect. Love the assorted colors. I keep some in my car for emergencies and the rest when my family goes hiking. Great buy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: They were wonderful to have!!!  Very convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! It was wonderful that as soon as the rain was over in Florida which is off and on off and on I could put them in the recycling bin instead of dealing with the wet poncho for the rest of the day. Loved them!!!!! Definitely take them on the next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item description- only 8, not 20!
customer_reviews.text: The product description says 20, but I only got 8. The description sticker on the box even says 20 pack, but it’s clearly a box of 8. I am frustrated because I ordered these for a camping trip that we are leaving for tomorrow, but I will be returning these...and going camping without the ponchos we had planned on.
customer_reviews.author: K. Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. We bought these for our trip to Disney World in Florida. They are compact and don’t take up a lot of room. My kids are 6 & 8 and the kids ponchos weren’t too big. It was nice to have two adult & two kid ponchos the same color. We could all coordinate our ponchos for the day which made it easier to find each other. I didn’t feel bad throwing them away at the end of the day because the pack had so many. I used them for one use each but they were durable for multiple uses. We didn’t experience any tears or rips.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Vacation must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Disney trip with 3 adults and 3 children. The park ponchos would’ve cost a lot more. I highly recommend you add these to your vacation kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These work great (and can be re-used a few times)
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a trip to Disney in the summer, where it will often rain heavily in the afternoons. For us, we used about 2 of these per person per week (a few days it didn't rain, and we re-used them). We were able to easily use them 3+ times. They are very light, so easy to carry. During that time, I only got one small rip rip (not bad enough that I couldn't use it); the kids were more likely to get small rips in theirs (the younger the kid, the more likely rips will occur). For very inexpensive ponchos designed to be disposable, this was a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: RScott

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a recent trip to Disney World. The family pack was perfect for us as we have 3 adults & 2 kids in our party (oldest child is 17). Durability was a big concern when ordering from a seller we haven't tried before, but the poncho's were light weight and there were no issues with tearing. Huge plus! In the picture above you can see that my husband even fit into a child size one WITH his backpack on! I somehow grabbed 3 kid size ones & 2 adults that day - oops! In any event, it still worked! :P
customer_reviews.author: benvenutofam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ponchos for emergencies!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect ponchos to keep in the back of your car or to take on vacation with you. I bought these for when we went to the beach for a week. Sure enough it rained almost every night when we took the kids to the boardwalk after dinner. Thank goodness for these ponchos! They are great throwaways if you want. (We kept reusing them.) Yes, they can be hot, but they are basically plastic bags shaped into a poncho. What is funny is that they sold the same exact ponchos for triple the price on the boardwalk.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Agrusti

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be one of the better choices thus far
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in the mail yesterday, for our upcoming Disney Trip. Writing a review now because I’ve gotten 3 emails already, asking to write a review. Without actually using the ponchos yet, they seem to be what I was looking for. Lightweight and easy to pack. Not sure of the durability yet- which is why I left 3 stars. They are all separately wrapped, which is great! But wish the came in a better package that kept them all together. I’ll likely put 10 of them in a gallon sized ziplock bag, to pack in our suitcase. Typical, quick shipping with prime.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good value for this convenient disposable poncho!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat the price for this quantity. Took the ponchos on family vacation in Florida where it rained daily. We would pack 4 each day at the theme park, use them, and when it stopped raining, trash them (so we weren’t carrying a wet poncho around all day). Then, we’d load up with four more the next day. They’re small enough to be carried in a purse/back pack. We rec’d 4 each in five colors... which helps you find your family in a crowd! Note: if you’re expecting a thick plastic multi-use poncho with a drawstring hood, this isn’t the poncho for you. It’s meant to be disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two Fun Boys

customer_reviews.title: Economical and colorful
customer_reviews.text: We used these every day during our recent summer trip to Walt Disney World. Worked great because they keep your clothes dry without overheating you, as a rain jacket would, and they’re much cheaper than the Disney Parks parkas that people who didn’t plan ahead are forced to buy at the parks. I also like they’re just designed for one-time use and you don’t have to worry about trying to fold it back for later.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Shih

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy if you’re worried about staying dry!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our trip to Disneyland! And we saved a ton of money since we didn’t have to buy ponchos from the park! They are folded up very small, we were able to throw 4 into our backpack. My poncho did tear a little bit when I was jumping on one of the rides, but it seriously made a huge difference! It fit over the top of our clothes and our backpacks, and kept us and our stuff dry! Absolutely recommend! Love that it has kid and adult sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney N

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described and shipped quickly. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for a trip to Disney World
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a trip to Disney World, just in case it rained. Well it poured and we were prepared. If you are going, you should really get these and avoid the lines and more expensive ones in the Disney World stores. These are well packaged, lite and really came in handy. Check out some of our videos on PRA7 Reviews youtube.
customer_reviews.author: PRA7 Reviews

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 20 pack of adult and kids ponchos for an upcoming trip to Legoland and Disney. I havent used them yet so I cant attest to the quality but I love the fact that they come in individual packages so we can take just what we need for the day and that they are brightly colored for the kids so I can easily spot them lol. Great to have on hand. Will be putting the extras in pocketbooks and in the car for those unexpected rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: SBlair

customer_reviews.title: Disposable ponchos 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: They were what I was expecting. A disposable poncho that I could toss. They were lightweight. They did tear near the end of the day though. The child sizes are not good for kids under 5-6 years old. The reason I'm giving it a 2 star is because the title indicates 20 ponchos (10 child and 10 adult) yet I received 12. The package was torn open and missing some, then it was stuffed into the amazon package that I received still sealed. I got 10 child and only 2 of the adult ponchos. Luckily, amazon customer service refunded it, but I did end up having to wear a child sized poncho during one of our days at disney.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Love that there were 4 colors insets of 4
customer_reviews.text: Love that there were 4 colors insets of 4...2 adults and 2 kids. Ponchos kept us warm and dry during severe rainstorms while visiting Disney World. They fit my children perfectly and we're not thick and bulky. They we're sturdy enough to use the entire day with our kids. Worked well for our entire family. Will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorel Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I'll purchase these again, absolutely!
customer_reviews.text: These are great to pack away. We use them for our family Disney trip as well as soccer games and they're fantastic. The adult sizes easily fit me and my backpack (I wear 2xl generally). Truth be told even the kids sizes seemed a little large but we tied the sleeves around the 3 yr olds arms and she was good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Handy & Useful
customer_reviews.text: Good buy - nice assortment of colors.& sizes - packaged well for travel. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these ahead of our trip to Disney World and I am so glad I did! It rained every day we were there and these were perfect. Only one tore, and that was because my child is too impatient sometimes. Great value and much more affordable than buying ponchos at Disney! I still have more than 10 left over and have stashed a few in the car for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Ches

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Disney World
customer_reviews.text: Of course, because I went to Disney World overly prepared...it did not rain. I checked the forecast before we left, and it was supposed to rain somewhat every day (typical for FLorida) But, I did open one of these, and if it HAD rained I think we would have loved them. lol. At least we will have them on hand whenever we need them.
customer_reviews.author: MC XXVI

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly. Good ponchos.
customer_reviews.text: We looked at the weather forecast before a vacation and saw rain in the forecast every day of our trip. I bought these and they arrived in time for our trip. Fortunately, we only had to use them infrequently, but carried them with us each day just in case. They are lightweight (we carried one for everyone in our group of 8 in the bottom of our tote each day). When we did use them, I appreciated that there were kid sizes so the kids could safely (and comfortably) walk around without tripping over the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great Ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use these amazing ponchos for upcoming trip to Orlando! They are so easy to carry that we can wear them for the water rides or in case we get the typical Florida storm. And if we don’t use them all and this trip they will certainly come in handy at our camp! Thanks for offering such a great product and getting it to me so quickly!Cheaper and better than getting them at the dollar store!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Collins

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos worked great. We used them in Disney world and they were great. The only thing that would’ve been nice was to have a draw string on the hood. As you walk the hood flies off your head leaving your head to get wet. We just held it closed with one hand, but it was a bit hard trying to push a stroller with one hand while holding the hood tight with the other. Not a deal breaker, but next time, I would either pack a clip to keep it closed or get another kind.
customer_reviews.author: luvindisney

customer_reviews.title: Good to have handy for sports and Disney
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have stocked in the car for rainy days. We took these to Disney and they worked perfect as disposable ponchos to keep you dry. We also used them for a rainy lacrosse tournament. They work very well but aren’t the most durable, so don’t expect to get more than a few uses out of the same one.
customer_reviews.author: SGTBaXa

customer_reviews.title: Nice disposable ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our tours during the COVID-19 epidemic. Normally we use our own but couldn't devise a cleaning process effective enough for the virus. These are a perfect solution as we can simply give them to our guests if neded, and hey are easily packable/storable. For our needs the downside is that the ratio of adult to child is 1:1, and we need far fewer of the children's size. Maybe 8 adult to 2 kids, or 7-3, would work much better for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Great ponchos
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of 10......with ages ranging from 3 to 70. This pack was perfect for me to take on our Montana, Dude Ranch vacation. The weather was iffy and wanted all of my bases covered. This package was exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a trip were taking out of the country,and they should be perfect. We'll keep you updated on how they perform! Update: worked perfectly! Small enough to pack away into luggage and threw when we were finished;)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Performed as expected
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pack of these for our WDW trip. We only needed them one day whole at Epcot, but it was great to have the smaller sizes. They weren’t exactly cheap so we reused them all day, stuffing them into pockets when we went into buildings. Kept our top halves dry...if only they made poncho pants and shoe covers, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: handy when carrying an umbrella isn't an option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack for a recent family vacation when there was rain predicted during a concert we would be attending. Umbrellas are obnoxious at those types of events, so these came in handy. Shipping was on time and I received the 10 adult and 10 children's ponchos as advertised. There several colors to choose from, so the kids wouldn't argue over who gets what.
customer_reviews.author: japlaza

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Picked up these ponchos for our family trip to Disney because it rains everyday in Florida. Looked at Walmart and they didn’t have anything reasonable and didn’t have much for kids. So off to amazon and found these for a good price, also had kid sizes too. Tried them on and can’t ask for more in a disposable poncho.
customer_reviews.author: chris vega

customer_reviews.title: Good ponchos
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought a big pack of these. We just spent three days at Disneyland and it rained every day we were there. The quality for these is fine and you don’t feel bad just tossing them when done. They kept me mostly dry. Just I wish the sleeves were longer. My sleeves were soaked but the rest of me was dry.
customer_reviews.author: Escape LV

customer_reviews.title: Rain rain go away
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not reusable as other reviewers have said but these are great kept us 50% dry and was pleased to have so many for our family of 4 because it rained the entire time we were at Disney. It was still so fun though and one of our favorite trips to the house of mouse
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Disney!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our Disney trip knowing we would get rained on. They are packed in small flat plastic packages making it so convenient to fit in a bag, fanny pack or even a pocket. When it rained it was easy to just un-wrap, use and throw away when we knew the rain was gone for the day. The family pack for adults and kids was a bonus since most sellers only have adult size. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Disney family MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for Disney World and were unlucky enough to use several. Great price hit multipack! I love the youth and children sizes. We took them off and kept them for the day so when it rained again we could use them. The different colors made it easy to tells which one belonged to each person.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vessels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one use
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I need them for. I keep them in the back of the car for in case of emergency and if I see a person in need stuck in the rain. I also got them for a class overnight trip in case kids forgot a raincoat. This is definitely more of a one use and done.
customer_reviews.author: SamaJama

customer_reviews.title: Super Value!  Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: The package was so nicely bundled and the colors are vibrant which was evident right away. The ponchos feel lightweight, which will be great to avoid sweltering in the Florida heat. Super value at less than a dollar a piece. Hopefully won’t need them at Disney World, but we’re prepared if we do!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great for Florida amusement parks
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great for Florida thunderstorms. They served their purpose and tossed at the end of the day. But I will say if you have kids 4ft or taller. Go with all adult size. It may be long but kid size went just below their waists. Also husband is 6’3 250 and he had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Family Pack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a family vacation where each member received a travel bag. This was included. I wished only the children’s ponchos were different colors. It would have been better if the adult ponchos were clear and not of various colors. Other than my personal color preference, it was a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family day trips....Disney, sports, and full days out!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our family trip to Disney in January! Amazing....used them for the water rides as we didn’t want to get soaked w the cooler temps. One day was a complete wash out but not for us because of these. We were able to enjoy super short lines and not spend $10 plus a piece for ones being sold at Disney! Everyone picked a color and we had extras with us daily so we were not stuck carry wet ones around. Plan to keep a set in our vehicles! Definite must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for vacation necessity
customer_reviews.text: A must have when packing for vacations. Learned our lesson on previous trips when the rain started. Wasted a lot of time trying to find a shop that sold disposable ponchos when every other tourist was doing the same thing. Price at most shops can be as high as $5.00 for one poncho. This is a great value, easy to toss in backpacks, takes up little space. Quality is fine for their purpose. Liked the family pack with sizes for both adults and the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our trip to Disneyland. Great price and I love that they come with adult and kid sizes! Perfect for Splash Mountain or any other water rides when the weather is a little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: JillS

customer_reviews.title: great for trips to Disneyworld
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for our family trip to Disneyworld for sudden downpours and of course the rides we love that get everyone soaked! We plan to "color code" them so we know whose is whose and pop a few in our backpack each day. This is a great deal, saving us a lot of money, and we loved getting a mix of kid and adult ponchos. If you don't think about needing a poncho until you get there you are going to spend about $10 each.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: These were purchased for emergency packs.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for emergency packs. Any extras were given to our Community Emergency Response Team Members (CERT) to have when responding to and emergency call out.
customer_reviews.author: Civil Mediator

customer_reviews.title: Great ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Bought these ponchos for a trip to Walt Disney World this summer knowing that it could start raining at anytime in Florida. Ponchos are easy to pack, we are a family of 5 and did not take up much space in the backpack. I really liked the variety of colors, it was fun wearing different colors and made it easy to spot each other. Ponchos are quite thin so definitely disposable but it was easy to shake them off, refold, and wear again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our rainy day at seaworld. Great for the price - they pack compact and then you can throw them out at the end of the day. Fit my 3 and 5 year olds just fine - a little short on my 6 ft husband but not too bad, and just fine for me and my baby in the carrier - both our heads through the top :)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It did what it was supposed to, but really thin so problematic in the wind and neither the adult or children's size has a rubber band around the wrist. I would probably buy a sturdier product the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: A415

customer_reviews.title: Alaskan cruise
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our Alaskan cruise....rain purposes. Luckily didn't have to use them as we had sunshine most of the time. Will keep on hand for those rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Plahn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for our Christmas vocation to Orlando. I am so glad I took them with me. It rained for two days. The only thing I don’t like is the hat part is always fall off. Otherwise , it is very durable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Just right, good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good selection of sizes, good number of individual items, well-made and fair price! Handy to have in car, golf bag, etc. Nothing to lose!
customer_reviews.author: Steve MBSC

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to put in the back pack and came in ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked out perfectly for our trip to WDW in July. They were easy to put in the back pack and came in handy during the frequent afternoon downpours. Quick shipping and product is as described. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Kaehr

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these ponchos for our family of 6 on a summer road trip. We only needed to use them once (and only a couple of us used them :) ) ... but they did the job! It's handy to have the extras for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The ponchos arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these ponchos for a trip to DisneyWorld. We have not used them yet, but they are such a good deal we won’t have to carry them around when we are done. I won’t feel guilty tossing them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Strembel

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and emergencies
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a big family trip to Disneyland - wanted to be prepared for rain, but also for our kids enthusiasm for the wet rides! They worked really well and kept everyone dry. We didn’t need to use them multiple times - they are a great disposable option. We’re keeping the extras for our emergency kit!
customer_reviews.author: Carina Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for trip to Disney World. These worked great. Lightweight, disposable, that is what we wanted!! I have more to use for other events or trips.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: items came on time and in great condition. will buy again. good price - no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: lesia chrominski

customer_reviews.title: Practical, portable, cost-effective
customer_reviews.text: The ponchos are exactly as described; 10 kids size and 10 adult sized. I like that they come in 5 different colors (red, blue, green, yellow and white) - each of my 4 kids can have their own color. Each poncho is individually wrapped so I can just throw one in each backpack before we leave on an excursion that might be rainy. Nothing fancy, just a good cost-effective way to protect against bad weather without hauling around a larger raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney Family Vacation!
customer_reviews.text: These colorful ponchos are perfect for our family vacation planned for 2020. Each family member will get a poncho in his/her Christmas stocking! Lightweight, so keeping it in our backpacks won't add a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne L.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! They were so organized! Adult sizes were in their own baggies as well as kid sizes. They were also organized by color. All we had to do is throw them into the backpack and go! The quality is great to! Great coverage when it rains! We were even able to reuse them! I highly recommend this product! Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and nice and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well in Disney. We were down in the last week of August which had very atypical weather, including a few all day rain storms. These worjed great. They were easily re-used from day to day. They held up well and did not cause you to overheat as rain ponchos often can.
customer_reviews.author: Gundamman

customer_reviews.title: Rescued!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine putting on a Thanksgiving 5K race in sunny Palm Springs, CA and getting a weather report two days before the race predicting rain! Ordered these great rain ponchos for our volunteers and received them overnight. Sizes were perfect for our volunteers ranging from middle school students through adults. I even had a leftover kid's size that I put on my Husky dog for a walk in the rain. Great product! Yes, I'd order again!
customer_reviews.author: Molly A. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a family vacation. It was convenient to find them on Amazon, and the package contents (colors, number, and variety of sizes) was just what we needed. The price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: pkf

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. These came in very handy when traveling. The adult ponchos seemed to be just a little short, compared to other ponchos I have used. I wish the adult ponchos were just a little longer. Child size was great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed for a our family while visiting Disney World. It is inevitable that there will be a shower at least one day while visiting the parks...we had 3. These were perfect...compact, adult/children sizes in one package, and disposable (so you don't have to carry around a wet rain jacket/poncho after the rain stops).
customer_reviews.author: Fancy A's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep on hand and great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Disney. They did their job and for a great price for so many I didn't care about throwing them away once we opened them. Used them to cover the stroller too. The kids version is not consistent in the sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brummer

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great day use ponchos that are light weight. We purchased these for Disney. They aren’t heavy and are easy to put on. They didn’t tear for us and we were able to wear the same ones multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Kidney4Canyon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We use these for Disney and they work great. Good price for what you get and easy to throw in our bag! Wish they were a bit longer, in 5’7” and they hit above my knee,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my family trip to Disney World. The ponchos were easy and light to pack and were perfect for the pop up shower. They are very durable and we were able to use the same poncho during the week.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cousens

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Took these with us to Disney world. It rains daily this time of the year and we used an adult size to cover the stroller while we were on the rides. There were 15 of us, 8 adults and 7 kids. The adult size is big enough for all shapes and sizes. The children ranged from 2 yrs to 13 yrs and the kids size was great, a little long for the 2 yr olds but could be easily cut to fit. These ponchos are a great price and easy to carry as each poncho is individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Graff

customer_reviews.title: Good ponchos in bulk
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 10 day trip to Disney with family. We got lucky and didnt have to use it too many times but they did the job. We used the old ones to make a rain cover for our stroller and that worked great. When these run out, I would definitely consider buying more for another trip.
customer_reviews.author: Halima Akil

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we were needing when we were traveling to Orlando for some days in the park in their rainy season. More than enough and are great to use and at a price where we didn't feel guilty throwing them away after we used them. They could have lasted longer but we didn't want to put up wet ponchos. Not the thickest material but plenty for a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Seth D. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pack of ponchos for our trip to Walt Disney World. They were perfect and protected us all from the rain. I love that it included both adult and kid-sized ponchos. Our sons are ages 6 and 9, and the ponchos fit both of them perfectly. We were able to keep our clothes and backpacks dry during downpours and rain showers. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K Bacho

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: These really came in handy for our Disney trip last week. I wish they were a little bit thicker, and the hoods stayed on better. My kids 6 & 8, though they’re on the taller side, could fit an adult size pancho. Had I known this I probably would’ve purchased the others ones they sell with the elastic around the wrist and the drawstring on the hood. Overall they did the job and kept us dry, not to mention the price is great for $20. If one rips no biggy, just get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tajsa Campos

customer_reviews.title: Fast, compact, effective
customer_reviews.text: We used these on our family trip to Disney World. These ponchos were excellent! They were small and compact, making them easy to transport. When we needed them, the packaging was easy to open and we were able to keep our heads, arms, and bodies dry during the rain. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Tolman

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: Update: they came in very useful for our Disney trip. While it never rained, they did save my family and I from being soaked on splash mountain. Havent used them yet because they’re for our Disney trip but I think they’re going to work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Eden & Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted at a price I was happy to pay.
customer_reviews.text: It's a generous package of very portable single/few use ponchos. The quality is exactly what you'd expect for that sort of thing and the price is quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rockwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for walks to and back from school! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my son and I walk a couple of blocks to his school. They were great for extra protection during rain/snow. I was concerned that his coat would be wet or damp by the time he had to walk home at the end of the day. These really kept him dry! Great value! No need to purchase a rain jacket!
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly as described and exceeded our expectations. Each poncho can be used more than once. We used them at two rides at Universal, Orlando and could have used them a few more times if there were any more rides
customer_reviews.author: NadimC

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. The material could be better. Good size and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Karine S. Santos

customer_reviews.title: great for disneyworld
customer_reviews.text: they're disposable but are good enough to use for 3 days for disney's afternoon pop up storms. the colors are great and helpful in spotting your kids. fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: victoryah

customer_reviews.title: Took to Disney for the entire family
customer_reviews.text: These came in handy for those GUARANTEED afternoon downpours in central Florida. I was able to distribute them to my entire family (there were 7 of us). The adult ponchos were large enough to also fit over my XL Nike backpack. They're disposable but we were able to use them again. Because they're disposable they are thin and lightweight. Perfect for a grab and go situation!
customer_reviews.author: Walter T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Prompt and just as described
customer_reviews.text: Got the order of family ponchos promptly and seems just as described. Family trip to Disney World coming up so these are perfect to pack in the back packs for protection from rain if needed. Kids were excited to pick out their colors.
customer_reviews.author: pmifflin

customer_reviews.title: As usual, Amazon immediately-YOU-that we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We are going to Walt Disney World, 5 adults and 2 children. You provided a cheap but useful solution to our need for 1. rain gear if needed 2. Ride splash protection-some of them do get wet. Thank You-The Hessel family-we are celebrating our 50th wedding anniversary
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hessel

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: Would give ZERO stars if that were possible. Shows 20 pack, only recieved 1. Terrible timing too. Needed for Disney vacation. The poncho itself looked like it would work, but who knows. Sending this one back for a refund. What a joke. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GrizzA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a family trip to Disney world. It has kid and adult sizes and they are flat enough to not take up too much room. After it rains and I use it I can just put in another one instead of fighting with it to fold up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Material is very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I did not experience this ponchos during rain. But the material is looks like colorful trash bags to me.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn 1101

customer_reviews.title: Good ponchos for a day at Disney
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Disney family trip. It rained one of the days so we were glad to have them. They held up well for for a day of use and i was glad to have the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Miche

customer_reviews.title: Great price for disposable rain ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Ponchos arrived quickly and were packaged well. There were 10 of each size, adult and child, and were a good price. They are exactly what I was expecting and I'm sure they will come in handy when the family visits Disney World!
customer_reviews.author: P Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and doesn’t fall apart
customer_reviews.text: We took these ponchos to Disney world and they were PERFECT! Wore them when it was raining and they didn’t rip or hang weird. Also, my husband is 6’5 and 285 and it fit him, as well as my little 4 year old. All in all very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: good emergency pancho
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, I got these for the Scout pack to walk in a Parade. They were perfect for the 2 miles we walked.
customer_reviews.author: Ardagna

customer_reviews.title: Purchase for Universal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to take to Universal for the family worked great. Small compact to throw in your bad and take with you and throw away when your done if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Kept us dry
customer_reviews.text: We brought these ponchos on a trip to Disneyworld. Massive thunderstorm first day we were there, but we stayed dry while others got soaked. Great purchase, especially because Disney was selling ponchos for $10 each.
customer_reviews.author: NYCparent

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I liked how they came individual packaged (great for traveling), had adult and kid sizes, and were different colors. I gave 5 stars for durability because they didn’t rip at all. I am sure if you wore a lot, they would rip because they’re thin.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened the package yet. I ordered these to take on our vacation to Disneyworld. I have a family of eight so I’m happy that I was able to buy a 20 pack of adult and child sizes. They are colorful and individually packed. They look like they are good quality. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Just a regular, thin poncho
customer_reviews.text: The price was decent, but it is misleading when you read the product description. It says in the description that they are “thicker” honestly they aren’t. Then below it, it says they are “thin” yet waterproof. I was hoping for the thicker part, but I’m sure they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Malarie
